---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Report a maintenance or housekeeping task
title: "Maintenance: [Short description of the task]"
labels: maintenance
assignees:

---

## Maintenance Guidelines

### Task Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

### Impact
Explain the impact of this maintenance task (e.g., improves performance, fixes technical debt).

### Proposed Approach
A brief description of how you plan to perform this maintenance (optional).

### Additional Context
Add any other context about the maintenance task here.
